commit message:
Merge pull request #13 from svetlemodry/master

Czech translation thanks to @svetlemodry
Construct servers preference screens from XML arrays
Set XML prefs for server name
Call resetActionBar from fragment when click on back button

Add multiple servers capability basic architecture.

One can now choose a server in a list and configure it specifically to upload pictures there.
At the moment, only PhotoBackup server is supported. This is an iso-functional version of the app.

Merge branch 'multiservers'
Check action in Boot Broadcast reveiver
